creator: thorsten@apache.org
text:
If creating a pub that contains a lot of moduls all menus from this modules are
included to the overall menu. The following patch assumes that in you
publication.xconf you define:
...
<module name="xhtml" exclude="SomeDoctypeWhereYouDoNotWantTheModuleMenu"/>

creator: thorsten@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 16890
Enable doctype matching in module menu includes
That is not a nice way to do it.
creator: thorsten@apache.org
